class.name: tidyup_fleximove_actions/action_executor_grasp_object
class.description: An action executor that grasps an object.

class.name: tidyup_fleximove_actions/action_executor_place_object
class.description: An action executor that puts down an object onto a static object.

class.name: tidyup_fleximove_actions/action_executor_arm_to_carry
class.description: An action executor that moves an arm to post grasp position.

class.name: tidyup_fleximove_actions/action_executor_arm_to_side
class.description: An action executor that moves the specified arm to a side position save for driving or sensing.

class.name: tidyup_fleximove_actions/action_executor_detect_graspable_objects
class.description: An action executor that calls object detection for grasping.
